item.title: Git
item.description: Tips Update the http post buffer value git config --global http.postBuffer 1048576000 Common Questions gnutls_handshake() failed: The TLS connection was non-properly terminated Cloning into 'Sophus'... fatal: unable to access 'https://github.com/yubaoliu/Sophus.git/': gnutls_handshake() failed: The TLS connection was non-properly terminated. ERROR: Service 'orbslam3' failed to build: The command '/bin/sh -c git clone https://github.com/yubaoliu/Sophus.git && cd Sophus && git checkout master && mkdir build && cd build && cmake .. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release && make -j3 && make install' returned a non-zero code: 128 Solution:
